description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 3, 5, 6} mod 7.
references: Robert Fludd, Utriusque Cosmi ... Historia, Oppenheim, 1617-1619.
links: Robert Fludd, Page 158 of "Utriusque Cosmi" in Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library Photonegatives Collection.
Robert Fludd, Larger version of the same image
Robert Fludd, Utriusque Cosmi, Maioris scilicet et Minoris, metaphysica, physica, atque technica Historia, available as ZIP or PDF download.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
prog: (Haskell)a047329 n = a047329_list !! (n-1)a047329_list = [1, 3, 5, 6] ++ map (+ 7) a047329_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Fludd reference from Brendan McKay, May 27, 2003
